content.text:
# Parapercis queenslandica

| taxon = Parapercis queenslandica
| authority = Imamura & Yoshino, 2007
}}
Parapercis queenslandica is a species of ray-finned fish in the sandperch family, Pinguipedidae. It is found in the western Pacific Ocean from Australia and New Caledonia.
Description
Parapercis queenslandica reaches a standard length of .

* [https://fishesofaustralia.net.au/home/species/2594 Blacktail Grubfish, Parapercis queenslandica Imamura & Yoshino 2007 @ fishesofaustralia.net.au]
